T02D2146:229a-16: rin chen 'byung ldan dbu brgyan pas //
T02D2146:229a-17: mnyam nyid ye shes don rtogs nas //
T02D2146:229a-18: bde chen lhun grub don rtogs shog / aom sv'a bhr'um ratna ka la sha aa bhishnytsa tu m'am /
T02D2146:229a-19: yang ltag par bum pa bzhag nas rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed /
T02D2146:229a-20: de'i 'od kyis gti mug dag ste chos dbyings ye shes rgyud la skyes /
T02D2146:229a-21: des dbu brgyan par bsams nas /
T02D2146:229a-22: gti mug rnam par dag nas ni //
T02D2146:229a-23: sangs rgyas rigs kyi dbu brgyan te //
T02D2146:229a-24: chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs nas //
T02D2146:229a-25: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog / aom bhr'um buddha ka la sha aa bhishnytsa tu m'am /
T02D2146:229a-26: yang rna ba g-yon par bum pa gzhag / don yod grub par bskyed /
T02D2146:229a-27: de'i 'od kyis phrag dog dag / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes //
T02D2146:229a-28: des dbu brgyan par bsams nas //
T02D2146:229a-29: phrag dog rnam par dag nas ni //
T02D2146:229a-30: don grub rigs kyis dbu brgyan te //
T02D2146:229a-31: bya grub ye shes don rtogs nas //
T02D2146:229a-32: ci bsams ma lus 'grub par shog / aom a'a bhr'um ka la sha aa bhishnytsa tu m'am /
T02D2146:229a-33: zhes rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bsams nas /
T02D2146:229a-34: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing me tog 'thor ro //
T02D2146:229a-35: bdag kho na mgon po tshe dpag med yin zhing /
T02D2146:229a-36: tshe dpag med kho na bdag yin snyam pa'i nga rgyal brtan pos gnas par bya'o //
T02D2146:229b-0: de rnams kyis thun mong ma yin @229b pa khyad par gyi dbang bstan no //
T02D2146:229b-1: de nas rjes gnang ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D2146:229b-2: dang po gtso bo yab yum bstan nas 'di kho na ltar yid la byos shig byas la /
T02D2146:229b-3: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02D2146:229b-4: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02D2146:229b-5: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02D2146:229b-6: khyod kyis nam du'ang ma byed cig / ces brjod /
T02D2146:229b-8: padma'i phreng ba la gtso bo'i sngags kyis bsangs te /
T02D2146:229b-9: bcom ldan 'di la stsal lags kyis //
T02D2146:229b-11: zhes pas gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2146:229b-12: de nas slob mas phreng ba snying gar bzung ste /
T02D2146:229b-13: bcom ldan bdag la stsal lags kyis ;
T02D2146:229b-14: / bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D2146:229b-15: zhes gtso bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags lan lngar rjes zlos bya'o //
T02D2146:229b-16: de nas mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum du
T02D2146:229b-17: gus pas phul cig ces pa'i rjes su gnang bar
T02D2146:229b-18: bya'o // de nas dam tshig gsum gyi dbang bskur bar bya ste ;
T02D2146:229b-19: / de yang slob ma dang rdo rje h'um las rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de /
T02D2146:229b-21: thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2146:229b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2146:229b-23: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2146:229b-24: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o //
T02D2146:229b-25: zhes rdo rje lag pa g-yas su gtad de snying
T02D2146:229b-26: gar bzung nas thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D2146:229b-28: de nas snad pa mtha' yas gsung gi rang bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02D2146:229b-29: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2146:229b-30: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchod ni byed pa po //
T02D2146:229b-31: sgra thams cad chos nyid kyi rang sgrar rtogs par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D2146:229b-32: de nas rang gi snying gar gtso bo yab yum bsams nas /
T02D2146:229b-33: yi dam gzugs ni brtan bya'i phyir //
T02D2146:229b-34: dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu brjod //
T02D2146:229b-35: dam tshig 'di la rtag gnas pas //
T02D2146:229b-36: lha yi sbyor ba rab tu grags //
T02D2146:229b-37: zhes pas lha sku snang stong sgyu ma'i skur blta bar bya'o //
T02D2146:229b-38: de nas spyi dang bye brag gi dbang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2146:229b-39: dang po slob ma skyil krung du 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i bar du chos kyi 'khor /
T02D2146:230a-2: deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa //
T02D2146:230a-3: tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2146:230a-4: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02D2146:230a-5: skyob pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2146:230a-6: chos kyi dung ni bla na med //
T02D2146:230a-7: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02D2146:230a-8: som nyi yid gnyis ma za cig /
T02D2146:230a-9: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D2146:230a-10: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02D2146:230a-11: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la //
T02D2146:230a-12: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02D2146:230a-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02D2146:230a-14: kun du khyod la bsrung bar gyis //
T02D2146:230a-16: de nas bye brag tu bskur ba ni /
T02D2146:230a-17: rang dang slob ma gnyis ka rnam snang du bskyed
T02D2146:230a-18: la rigs lnga'i sgo nas don bya snyam du bsams
T02D2146:230a-19: nas / 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D2146:230a-20: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2146:230a-21: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa'i //
T02D2146:230a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2146:230a-23: zhes brjod las ngas rgyas kyi rigs kyis gdul bya
T02D2146:230a-24: gti mug can gyi don bya snyam du bsam mo
T02D2146:230a-25: // de bzhin du rdo rje dang nor bu dang padma dang /
T02D2146:230a-26: rgya gram rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor ba rnams la chog gong bzhin spel bar bya'o //
T02D2146:230a-27: de nas rjes kyi chog bstan par bya ste /
T02D2146:230a-28: de yang lung bstan pa ni /
T02D2146:230a-29: khyod kyi phung po lnga khams lnga tshe dpag med yab yum yin par bdag gis yung bstan gyis /
T02D2146:230a-30: deng 'dir ngas khyod lung bstan bya //
T02D2146:230a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2146:230a-32: srid pa rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
T02D2146:230a-35: de nas gzings bstod pa ni ;
T02D2146:230a-36: / yi dam lha dang mnyam par ni //
T02D2146:230a-38: dga' zhing spro ba chen po yis //
T02D2146:230a-39: phyi rol mi bsams nang du'o //
T02D2146:230a-41: de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni //
T02D2146:230a-42: bde chen theg ba 'di la ni //
T02D2146:230a-43: slan chad 'chi ba yod min te //
T02D2146:230a-44: mi tshugs pa dang mi gsod pas //
T02D2146:230a-45: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D2146:230a-47: de rnams bstan pa'i yan lag tu brtul zhugs kyi dbang sbyin pa ni /
T02D2146:230a-48: sbrang dang bdud rtsi bsres la /
T02D2146:230a-49: 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la slob ma la byin te /
T02D2146:230b-0: gang gis reg dang @230b 'thungs pa yis //
T02D2146:230b-1: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kun //
T02D2146:230b-2: thams cad nga lta mngon du 'gyur //
T02D2146:230b-4: gzhan gyis rdzi par mi nus pa'i //
T02D2146:230b-5: mi shigs rdo rje pha lam 'gyur //
T02D2146:230b-6: lhun grub bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2146:230b-7: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2146:230b-8: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su padma dmar
T02D2146:230b-9: bo 'dam ma brgyad pa'i steng du tshe dpag med
T02D2146:230b-10: yab yum zhal sbyor du bsam /
T02D2146:230b-11: de la ye shes pa gzhug sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2146:230b-12: mchod pa dang bstod ba byas nas gsang sgrub ltar bzlas pa byas /
T02D2146:230b-13: rang yang gtso bo yab yum du bsams nas snyoms
T02D2146:230b-14: 'jug byas pas byang sems dkar dmar gsang gnas nas
T02D2146:230b-15: don / yab yum rnams kyang snyoms 'jug byas nas
T02D2146:230b-16: gsang gnas nas byang sems dkar dmar na rar byung
T02D2146:230b-17: don / bar bsam / de nas ka p'a la ra sbrang bur ma bdud rtsi bsres la /
T02D2146:230b-18: der byang sems dkar dmar bstim pa dang ka p'a
T02D2146:230b-19: la 'chi med ye shes kyi bdud rtsi byang sems
T02D2146:230b-20: dkar bos mer gyis khengs par bsam mo //
T02D2146:230b-21: de nas mandal steng du bla ma dang gtso bo
T02D2146:230b-22: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i gsang gnas byang sems
T02D2146:230b-24: slob ma'i lce thog tu thim pas bde stong gi nyams rgyud la skyes pa dang /
T02D2146:230b-25: lus byang sems dmar pos khengs bar bsams nas ka p'a la'i bdud rtsi byin la /
T02D2146:230b-26: phyogs bcu rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi //
T02D2146:230b-27: gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yi //
T02D2146:230b-28: nga yi byang chub sems kyi rgyun //
T02D2146:230b-29: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2146:230b-31: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni //
T02D2146:230b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D2146:230b-33: phyogs tshon gyi steng du slob ma yab yum du
T02D2146:230b-34: bskyed / de nas yum gos dkar mo dang /
T02D2146:230b-35: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byas pas /
T02D2146:230b-36: yum gyi byang sems dmar pos rtsa gsum 'khor lo rim gyis dmar mer gyis khengs par bsams la /
T02D2146:230b-37: gzhon nu yid 'od bde ba'i mchog / the tshom spangs nas bsten par bya //
T02D2146:230b-38: brjod bral lhan cig skyes dga' ba //
T02D2146:230b-42: de nas dbang bzhi pa byang du ras dkar po'i steng du bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2146:231a-0: rang gtso bo yab yum du @231a * //
T02D2146:231a-1: gsal ba'i gnas bzhir tshe dpag med //
T02D2146:231a-2: tshon gang tsam pa zhal sbyor du bsam //
T02D2146:231a-3: de rnams dmigs pa med pa'i ngang la gnas par bya ste /
T02D2146:231a-4: de yang ma bcos par rang grol du bzhag la //
T02D2146:231a-5: ltos shig ltos shig sems la ltos //
T02D2146:231a-6: sems nyid cir yang grub pa med //
T02D2146:231a-7: bsal gzhag dgag sgrub ma lus pa //
T02D2146:231a-8: rang grol nyid du gnas pa'o //
T02D2146:231a-9: zhes phyag rgya chen po'i ngo sprod kyang bya //
T02D2146:231a-10: dus 'dir rang grol lhun grub tu rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2146:231a-11: bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag
T02D2146:231a-12: tu med pa'i dbang bzhi bskur ba'i cho ga'i las
T02D2146:231a-13: khrigs 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum pa zhes
